chatcalc.decimal_format.description:
The decimal format used by the mod to display numbers; ex: #,##0.## has commas, numbers smaller than 0 have a leading 0 (.3 into 0.3), and stores two decimal places.
More information can be found here: https://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/i18n/format/decimalFormat.html
Using an invalid format *will* crash the game
chatcalc.radians.description: A toggle to convert numbers from degrees to radians before calculating in trig equations such as sin(), cos(), and tan()
chatcalc.debug_tokens.description: A debug option to display all of the parsed tokens in chat and console before they get evaluated
